Name: mal-abdulhameedmada-la
Author: Abdul Hameed Madani And Kunhi Mohammed

Translations.Text: phir'aun parannu: ninnal enne vitu; musaye nan keallum. avan avanre raksitavine viliccu prart'thiccu keallatte. avan ninnalute matam marri marikkukayea bhumiyil kulappam kuttippeakkukayea ceyyumenn tirccayayum nan bhayappetunnu
musa parannu: enre raksitavum ninnalute raksitavumayittullavaneat‌, vicaranayute divasattil visvasikkatta ella ahankarikalil ninnum nan saranam tetunnu

phir'aunre alkkarilppetta - tanre visvasam maraccu veccukeantirunna - oru visvasiyaya manusyan parannu: enre raksitav allahuvan enn parayunnatinal ninnal oru manusyane keallukayea? addeham ninnalkk ninnalute raksitavinkal ninnulla vyaktamaya telivukal keantu vannittunt‌. addeham kallam parayunnavananenkil kallam parayunnatinre deasam addehattin tanneyan‌. addeham satyam parayunnavananenkilea addeham ninnalkk takkit nalkunna cila karyannal (siksakal) ninnale badhikkukayum ceyyum. atikramakariyum vyajavadiyumayittulla oraleyum allahu nervaliyilakkukayilla; tircca

enre janannale, bhumiyil mikaccunilkkunnavar enna nilayil inn adhipatyam ninnalkk tanne. ennal allahuvinre siksa namukk vannal atil ninn nam'me raksiccu sahayikkan arunt‌? phir'aun parannu: nan (sariyayi) kanunna margam matraman nan ninnalkk kaniccutarunnat‌. sariyaya margattilekkallate nan ninnale nayikkukayilla
a visvasicca al parannu: enre janannale, a kaksikalute divasam pealeyulla onn tirccayayum ninnalute karyattilum nan bhayappetunnu
atayat nuhinre janatayuteyum adinreyum thamudinreyum avarkk sesamullavaruteyum anubhavattin tulyamayat‌. dasanmareat yatearu akramavum ceyyan allahu uddesikkunnilla
enre janannale, (ninnal) parasparam viliccukelunna divasatte ninnalute karyattil tirccayayum nan bhayappetunnu
atayat ninnal pinneakkam tirinneatunna divasam. allahuvinre siksayil ninnum raksanalkunna oralum ninnalkkilla. etearale allahu valiterrikkunnuvea, avan nervali kanikkan arumilla
